content.prompt: Which of the following population patterns is common in more developed countries?

choices.label: High birth rates, leading to younger age structures
An uneven ratio of males to females, leading to lower total fertility rates
Higher population densities in rural areas, leading to scarcity of natural resources
A rapidly increasing working-age population, leading to high unemployment rates
Declining levels of fertility and mortality, leading to older age structures

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
